definition: to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: We think it’s possible that your company is at risk in this area as well.
sentences.chinese: 因而我們認爲貴司在這個領域也可能面臨同樣的風險。

sentences.english: Refer connected to the company after the board received questionable.
sentences.chinese: 介時收到板後再與貴司商榷。

sentences.english: A. Are raw materials traceable throughout your production systems?
sentences.chinese: 在貴司的整個生產體系中原材料都有可追溯性嗎？

sentences.english: What is the budgeted salary range?
sentences.chinese: 貴司薪資預算範圍是什麼？

sentences.english: It would be much appreciated if you could send me the reply as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果貴司能儘早的寄給我，我將十分感激。

sentences.english: Have you any business relations with Italian partners?
sentences.chinese: 貴司與意大利合作伙伴有何業務關係？

sentences.english: Time period for tooling is 8 days from the date receiving your sample.
sentences.chinese: 開模時間爲收到貴司開模樣板後8天完成。

sentences.english: Here with we give you the production pre release for part numer 2323.
sentences.chinese: 謹此給予貴司零件號爲2323的生產預許可。

sentences.english: You can entrust us with the soled agency for your shirt in our country.
sentences.chinese: 你們可以委託我司作爲貴司襯衫在我國的獨家代理商。

sentences.english: We send you the documents in order that you can clear customs.
sentences.chinese: 我們給你寄去的單據，是爲了貴司辦理清關等事宜。

sentences.english: It's our greated honor to have the opportunity to work with your respectable company.
sentences.chinese: 能有機會與貴司合作是我們莫大的榮幸。

sentences.english: Our market survey informs us that you are interested in the import of machinery.
sentences.chinese: 根據我司的市場調查得知，貴司對進口機器頗感興趣。

sentences.english: Lipper DataFeed Services - Customize Lipper data to meet your company's research and reporting needs.
sentences.chinese: 爲客戶量身定做的裏浦數據滿足貴司的研究報告需要。

sentences.english: Floating exchange rate more than how many %, and your company will update to our price?
sentences.chinese: 匯率浮動超過多少%時，貴司會更新價錢給我司？

sentences.english: Are such products made to your specification or those of buyer .
sentences.chinese: 請選擇此產品是由貴司設計還是買方設計？

sentences.english: You may know details of our company from our website.
sentences.chinese: 貴司能從我司網址上了解我司的具體情況。
